channel.title: Developer Fusion Latest Code
channel.description: Summary of the latest articles published on Developer Fusion
channel.generator: Developer Fusion RSS Feed Generator v1.0

item.title: Capture a Screen Shot
item.description: Demonstrates how to capture a screen shot of the entire desktop, or a particular window in C# or VB.NET.
item.author: James Crowley
item.subject: .NET

item.title: A PagingRepeater control
item.description: A PagingRepeater control extending Repeater with page navigation
item.author: Dan Glass
item.subject: ASP.NET

item.title: Create Hashes - MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512
item.description: In PHP its a simple task to generate hashes, but in C# it takes a little more work. We'll create a Hash class to simplify the process.
item.author: David Cumps
item.subject: C#

item.title: RSS Feed Helper Class
item.description: A simple helper class to make generating an RSS feed a piece of cake - its the one we use on Developer Fusion too!
item.author: James Crowley
item.subject: C#

item.title: How to access a MySQL database with .NET
item.description: Demonstrates how to connect to a MySQL database with C#.
item.author: Edward Tanguay
item.subject: ASP.NET

item.title: UI Threading Helper Classes
item.description: One of the most cumbersome things you will ever have to do with Winforms is updating your User interface while receiving events from another thread. These helper classes make it a breeze.
item.author: Roy Osherove
item.subject: C#

item.title: Executing a .CS file
item.description: Demonstrates how to write a C# program that can "launch" a .cs file and execute it.
item.author: David Cumps
item.subject: C#

item.title: Associating your program with every file
item.description: Learn how to add a program to the shell right click menu for every file.
item.author: David Cumps
item.subject: C#

item.title: CExtStatusControlBar - Managing status bar's panes
item.description: An enhanced status bar which allows you to easily add/remove almost any controls to/from its panes, on-the-fly.
item.author: Dmitriy Yakovlev
item.subject: C/C++

item.title: Add a JavaScript popup to an ASP.NET button
item.description: How to add a javascript popup (alert) question to an ASP.NET button control.
item.author: Edward Tanguay
item.subject: ASP.NET
